PatternDescription: Security Manager (DEPRECATED JDK 17 Â removed JDK 21)
Fix: Remove SecurityManager; use modern security frameworks

PatternDescription: Scriptlets (<% %>) increase risk during migration; prefer taglibs/EL.
Fix: Refactor scriptlets to JSTL/EL or migrate to Thymeleaf.
RemediationDescription: Refactor scriptlets to taglibs/EL or migrate views (e.g. Thymeleaf).
